Package org.lrdm

Class Network

java.lang.Object
org.lrdm.Network
public class Network extends Object
An RDM Network. Holds references to all mirrors part of the net. Offers methods to change the number of mirrors and initiates the change. Mirrors take time to start up and get ready.
Author:
Sebastian GÃ¶tz (sebastian.goetz@acm.org)

  • Constructor Details

    • Network

      public Network(TopologyStrategy strategy, int numMirrors, int numLinks, int fileSize, Properties props)
      Creates a new network. Uses parameters for number of mirrors and links. Uses the TopologyStrategy to interlink the mirrors.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the TopologyStrategy to use
      numMirrors - the number of mirrors to be instantiated
      numLinks - the number of links each mirror should have
      props - the properties of the simulation

  • Method Details

    • getProps

      public Properties getProps()

    • registerProbe

      public void registerProbe(Probe p)
      Adds a probe to the network, which will be called at each simulation time step.
      Parameters:
      p - Probe a probe to be notified by the simulation at each time step.

    • setEffector

      public void setEffector(Effector e)
      Set the effector implementation to be used.
      Parameters:
      e - the Effector to be used

    • getMirrors

      public List<Mirror> getMirrors()
      Returns aks Mirrors of the net.
      Returns:
      List of all Mirrors

    • getMirrorsSortedById

      public List<Mirror> getMirrorsSortedById()
      Get Mirrors sorted by ID in ascending order.
      Returns:
      List or mirrors sorted in ascending order by ID

    • getLinks

      public Set<Link> getLinks()
      Returns all links of the net as a set.
      Returns:
      Set of Links of the whole net.

    • setNumMirrors

      public void setNumMirrors(int newMirrors, int simTime)
      Set a new target number of mirrors. Will initiate the startup or shutdown of mirrors if there are too many or too few.
      Parameters:
      newMirrors - (int) new target number of mirrors (i.e., not the number of mirrors to add)
      simTime - (int) current simulation time for logging purposes

    • setTopologyStrategy

      public void setTopologyStrategy(TopologyStrategy strategy, int timeStep)
      Set the topology strategy to use. This will call TopologyStrategy.restartNetwork(Network, Properties, int) to reestablish the links between the mirrors accordingly.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the concrete strategy to use for the topology
      timeStep - the timestep at which this change shall take effect

    • setNumTargetedLinksPerMirror

      public void setNumTargetedLinksPerMirror(int numTargetLinksPerMirror, int timeStep)
      Set the number of expected links per mirror, i.e., how many links a single mirror should have. This will call TopologyStrategy.restartNetwork(Network, Properties, int) to establish the required links.
      Parameters:
      numTargetLinksPerMirror - expected number of links per mirror
      timeStep - simulation time at which this change shall take effect

    • getTopologyStrategy

      public TopologyStrategy getTopologyStrategy()
      Returns:
      the currently used TopologyStrategy

    • getNumMirrors

      public int getNumMirrors()
      Returns:
      number of mirrors in the net (regardless of their state)

    • getNumLinks

      public int getNumLinks()
      Returns:
      number of all links in the net regardless of their state

    • getNumActiveLinks

      public int getNumActiveLinks()
      Get the number of links, which are currently in ACTIVE state.
      Returns:
      current number of active links

    • getBandwidthUsed

      public int getBandwidthUsed(int timestep)
      Get the bandwidth used by the network for a specific simulation time.
      Parameters:
      timestep - the simulation time
      Returns:
      bandwidth used at the respective timestep

    • getNumTargetLinksPerMirror

      public int getNumTargetLinksPerMirror()
      Get the number of target links per mirror, i.e., how many links each mirror should have.
      Returns:
      number of links expected for each mirror

    • getNumTargetLinks

      public int getNumTargetLinks()
      Get the number of target links, i.e., how many links the whole network should contain.
      Returns:
      number of links expected for the whole network

    • getNumTargetMirrors

      public int getNumTargetMirrors()
      Returns:
      targeted number of ready mirrors

    • getNumReadyMirrors

      public int getNumReadyMirrors()
      Returns:
      current number of ready mirrors

    • getBandwidthHistory

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getBandwidthHistory()
      Get the history of the overall bandwidth use.
      Returns:
      a map with simulation time as key and the bandwidth used as value

    • getActiveLinksHistory

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getActiveLinksHistory()
      Get the history of active links.
      Returns:
      a Map with simulation time as key and the number of active links as value

    • getTtwHistory

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getTtwHistory()
      Get the history of the time to write metric.
      Returns:
      a Map with simulation time as key and the time to write metric as value

    • timeStep

      public void timeStep(int simTime)
      Performs a single simulation step. Clears stopped mirrors and delegates simulation to all active mirrors. Notifies all probes.
      Parameters:
      simTime - (int) current simulation time for logging purposes
